item.title: Bug Management
item.description: Some personal notes on simplifying the process so that one can focus on getting back to the other tasks at hand. On Reporting Bugs Focus on the impact for the client. You do not need to debug right away. You do not need to establish the timeline - The report can solely include the context. The person assigned to the issue will pick on the context provided in the ticket and explore.
